#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus
{
  int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId()
  {
    Log_info("ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId");
    verify(sp_log_svr_);
    int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
    ret = ret << 32;


    ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++;
    return ret;
  }

  /**
   * @brief Put a key-value pair into the map.
   *
   * @param oid The operation ID.
   * @param k The key.
   * @param v The value.
   * @return int KV_SUCCESS if successful, KV_TIMEOUT if timed out, KV_NOTLEADER if not leader.
   */
  int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t &oid,
                         const string &k,
                         const string &v)
  {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(shardkv_mutex_);
    std::string oid_str = std::to_string(oid);

    // Check if there's an existing event for this operation
    if (outstanding_requests_.find(oid_str) != outstanding_requests_.end())
    {
      // Event already exists.
      // Log_info("An event for oid %s already exists.", oid_str.c_str());
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    uint64_t index, term;
    bool is_leader;



    auto cmd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    cmd->data_.push_back(oid_str);
    cmd->data_.push_back("put");
    cmd->data_.push_back(k);
    cmd->data_.push_back(v);

    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> ret = cmd;
    is_leader = GetRaftServer().Start(ret, &index, &term);

    // Log_info("ShardKvServer::Put -> is_leader %d", is_leader);

    if (!is_leader)
    {
      // Log_info("ShardKvServer::Put -> KV_NOTLEADER");
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    // Create a new event for this operation
    auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    outstanding_requests_[oid_str] = event;

    // Wait for the event to be signaled or timeout
    event->Wait(1000000);                 // Wait for 1 second
    outstanding_requests_.erase(oid_str); // Clean up

    // Check if the event timed out
    if (event->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }

    kv_store_[k] = v;
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }

  /**
   * @brief Append a value to the value of a key.
   *
   * @param oid The operation ID.
   * @param k The key of the operation.
   * @param v The value to append.
   * @return int KV_SUCCESS if the operation is successful, KV_NOTLEADER if the server is not the leader, KV_TIMEOUT if the operation times out.
   */


  int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t &oid,
                            const string &k,
                            const string &v)
  {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    // Log_info("ShardKvServer::Append -> {key: %s, value: %s}", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(shardkv_mutex_);
    std::string oid_str = std::to_string(oid);

    // Check if there's an existing event for this operation
    if (outstanding_requests_.find(oid_str) != outstanding_requests_.end())
    {
      // Event already exists.
      // Log_info("An event for oid %s already exists.", oid_str.c_str());
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }

    uint64_t index, term;
    bool is_leader;



    auto cmd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    cmd->data_.push_back(oid_str);
    cmd->data_.push_back("append");
    cmd->data_.push_back(k);
    cmd->data_.push_back(v);

    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> ret = cmd;
    is_leader = GetRaftServer().Start(ret, &index, &term);

    if (!is_leader)
    {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    // Create a new event for this operation
    auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    outstanding_requests_[oid_str] = event;

    // Wait for the event to be signaled or timeout
    event->Wait(1000000);                 // Wait for 1 second
    outstanding_requests_.erase(oid_str); // Clean up

    // Check if the event timed out
    if (event->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }

    kv_store_[k] += v;


    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }

  /**
   * @brief Get the value of a key.
   *
   * @param oid The operation ID.
   * @param k The key.
   * @param v The value.
   * @return int KV_SUCCESS if successful, KV_TIMEOUT if timed out, KV_NOTLEADER if not leader.
   */
  int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t &oid,
                         const string &k,
                         string *v)
  {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    // Log_info("ShardKvServer::Get -> %s", k.c_str());
    std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(shardkv_mutex_);
    std::string oid_str = std::to_string(oid);

    // Check if there's an existing event for this operation
    if (outstanding_requests_.find(oid_str) != outstanding_requests_.end())
    {
      // Event already exists.
      // Log_info("An event for oid %s already exists.", oid_str.c_str());
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }

    uint64_t index, term;
    bool is_leader;

    auto cmd = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    cmd->data_.push_back(oid_str);
    cmd->data_.push_back("get");
    cmd->data_.push_back(k);

    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> ret = cmd;
    is_leader = GetRaftServer().Start(ret, &index, &term);

    if (!is_leader)
    {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    // Create a new event for this operation
    auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    outstanding_requests_[oid_str] = event;

    // Wait for the event to be signaled or timeout
    event->Wait(1000000);                 // Wait for 1 second
    outstanding_requests_.erase(oid_str); // Clean up

    // Check if the event timed out
    if (event->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }

    auto it = kv_store_.find(k);
    if (it != kv_store_.end())
    {
      *v = it->second;
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }

    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  /**
   * @brief Entry point for handling committed commands.
   *
   * @param m The command.
   * @note This function is called by the raft server when a command is committed.
   */
  void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable &m)
  {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(shardkv_mutex_);
    auto cmd = static_cast<MultiStringMarshallable *>(&m);
    std::string oid_str = cmd->data_[0];
    // Notify the waiting operation (if exists)
    if (outstanding_requests_.count(oid_str) != 0)
    {
      outstanding_requests_[oid_str]->Set(1);
      // Log_info("ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand -> oid_str: %s", oid_str.c_str());
      outstanding_requests_.erase(oid_str); // Clean up after signaling
    }
  }

  shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator *comm)
  {
    auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
    cli->commo_ = comm;
    verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
    static uint32_t id = 0;
    id++;
    cli->cli_id_ = id;
    return cli;
  }

} // namespace janus;
